ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Playing a rogue
ygData.msgSnippet: Wulfric, you could try grouping in Rathe Mountains in a Hill Giant group.  Xp there is good up till at least 51. At about I think say 48 or 49 you could
ygData.messageBody:
Wulfric,
you could try grouping in Rathe Mountains in a Hill Giant group. Xp there
is good up till at least 51. At about I think say 48 or 49 you could
probably solo the HG pretty well. My 53 Shammy was there not long ago and
the HG were more green than Light Blue by then but the Cash is great and you
can go to the inn and there is a short guy in the hut closest toward HG
valley who is on the left as you enter the hut that if you buy a stack of or
2 or three of amber (cost about 42pp pr stack with a Charisma of 140) and
resell back to him will get rid of the smaller coins tremendously and yield
you a return of around 39 to 40pp per stack.. I've done this many a time
when ever I needed to get cash up for my tradeskills supplies.

Kwasi
----- Original Message -----
From: "Wulfric Rennison" <wulftech@...>


Well I've been playing my rogue consistently now since last Thursday. I've
gone up 4 levels. I'm almost to level 37 now. Still in Dawnshroud Peaks.
But I guess I'm getting too impatient. XP isn't coming nearly as fast as
I'd like. I can pretty much solo lightcrawlers and some shrooms now. The
tribals I can take if I have buffs, but that's about it. I'm getting really
tired of Dawnshroud. Anybody have any suggestions on where I can go next
that the xp might come a little faster? I was told Dreadlands, but I should
wait until I'm about level 38. A place with some nice plat would be good
too as I need to start upgrading my weapons and armor. I need a better bow
and some + stamina gear. Any suggestions on what gear I could get or where
I could hunt?

Wulfric Rennison
36 Half Elf Rogue
Cazic Thule server
